PHP Manual

idn_strerror

(PECL idn >= 0.2)

idn_strerror — Returns string describing the IDNA error code

Description

string idn_strerror ( int $errorcode )

This function returns the error message string that corresponds to the given error code.

Parameters

errorcode

The error code as returned by idn_to_ascii() or idn_to_utf8().

Return Values

The corresponding libidn error message string is returned.

See Also

  • idn_to_ascii() - Convert UTF-8 encoded domain name to ASCII
  • idn_to_utf8() - Convert ASCII encoded domain name to UTF-8
